page.title: 16Transport Continued
page.content: Trains travel through Woodley to Manchester Piccadilly via Hyde and Guide Bridge. The main feature of the main road from Stockport to Hyde which passes through Bredbury and Woodley (A560) is its congested nature. Heavy traffic travelling through to Sheffield has increased since the opening of the M63 junction at Portwood, Stockport. Children from Arden, St. Mark's and Woodley Primary Schools are heavily dependant on school crossing patrols because of this pelican crossings at Osborne Street, Lower Bredbury and Woodley Precinct help pedestrian safety and are used by some children at Arden and Woodley. Traffic through Romiley centre is lighter, tending to be local and domestic.
